document_data.mainbody:
A Tour of Tempest was an Umberlant book that discussed the divine tempest domain, written by and published sometime in or before the late 15 century DR.
A Tour of Tempest was a large tome the size of an encyclopedia. The books writing style was wild with its content being sometimes hard to understand.
A copy of A Tour of Tempest could be found in the  in Water Queens House, a temple dedicated to Umberlee located in the Lower City of Baldurs Gate.
